article:
Wang Bing is a 12-year-old boy. He likes sports very much and  _  well in sports.
One afternoon, he comes   out of  the classroom and   sees  his father at the school gate. He is very   _  and then he runs to his father. "Dad, please don't wait   for me after school next time. I can go home by myself  ."
On their way  home , Wang Bing sees some boys skating   in a park. "Can I go and skate, Dad?" asks Wang Bing. "I'm   _ , my boy. You must go home and do your homework,"  says his father, "but I can buy you an ice cream."
Then his father buys an ice cream   _  him. When Wang Bing wants  to eat  it, a fly   flies to the ice cream.
"Drive off   the fly," says his father, "It's very dirty." But Wang Bing   _  with a smile, "You don't let me skate, but can you let  _  skate for a while  ?"
